job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>We have an urgent need for a <strong>Site Reliability Engineer </strong>for one of our client's ongoing projects. This is a Remote role for now. </p><p><strong> </strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Software Site Reliability Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location: Remote</strong></p><p>Type: Contract </p><p>Duration: 8 Months + </p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Serve as a primary point of contact for the overall health, performance, and capacity of one or more of our services.</li><li>Partner closely with our development teams and product managers to architect and build features that are highly available, performant and secure</li><li>Develop innovative ways to smartly measure, monitor &amp; report application and infrastructure health</li><li>Gain deep knowledge of our application stack</li><li>Function well in a fast-paced and rapidly-changing environment</li><li>Participate in a 24x7 on-call rotations.</li><li>Ability to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasks.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Basic Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>3 years of relevant experience in a production environment</li><li>Experience in coding in one of the programming languages: C++, C, Java, Python, Go.</li><li>Experience with architecting, developing and troubleshooting large scale systems.</li><li>Experience with algorithms and data structures and/or Unix/Linux systems internals (e.g., filesystems, system calls) and administration.</li><li>Experience with continuous integration and deployment automation tools such as Drone, Spinnaker, Harness, etc.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Hands-on working with private or public cloud (GCP / AWS/ Azure)</li><li>3 years of experience in computing, distributed systems, storage, or networking.</li><li>Previous experience working with geographically-distributed coworkers.</li><li>Should have led teams, collaborating cross-functionally to deliver complex software features and solutions.</li></ul><p></p>
